originalText.text: Went here for a shoulder location and have been coming for a few weeks now. The staff are great about giving us our regime and pushing us! In the weeks I have coming I have been able to greatly increase the mobility and flexibility of my shoulder. Also special out Heta for being a great physical therapist -- definitely recommend!

originalText.text: Theradynamics Physical & Occupational Therapy located at 150St. & Broadway in Manhattan, is only a half mile from my residence. I'm able to walk there and back which helps with my recovery from partial left knee replacement. Dr. Vaidehi & Jay are EXCELLENT at their jobs. They're very attentive and caring. I always look forward to seeing them for my therapy.

originalText.text: I came in with partially torn ligaments at my rotator cuff on my right side.  Now, weeks later my arm can function better than before.  I’m grateful for all the kindness and professionalism the workers have displayed towards me.  It truly added to my recovery!!!!!   Thank you!!!!

text.text: I came in with partially torn ligaments at my rotator cuff on my right side.  Now, weeks later my arm can function better than before.  I’m grateful for all the kindness and professionalism the workers have displayed towards me.  It truly added to my recovery!!!!!   Thank you!!!!

originalText.text:
A classic therapy factory.

The actual therapists at this place are doing good work with very little support from whoever is in charge administratively. Each and every day they are overbooked, under-staffed and under-equipped. Care is cursory and inconsistent, and you’ll be seen by several therapists - each of whom have no idea what happened on your previous visit with the previous therapist.

Both my surgeon (who has removed them from their recommended therapist list) and my insurance advised me to go elsewhere for care - after over two months of treatment.  Calls to the front desk for help annoy them, and they transfer you to an answering service that never - not once - calls you or your insurance or your doctor back.

Whatever your medical or PT needs are, DO NOT RISK IT HERE. I’ve since found another place for PT, and can honestly say that whatever is happening here is not normal.

I genuinely hope they can somehow pull it together. Their therapists deserve much better, and so do you.

originalText.text: I have been coming for therapy here since long time. I feel that they help me 100% and I love this place. Therapists and Kathy, Kimberly  front desk, all staff are really good and helpful. I will definitely recommend this place.
